item.title: About
item.description: I am a data analyst at Norfolk County Council’s Inteligence & Analytics department working mostly with data on Children’s Services and Public Health. I have a masters degree in Research Methods of Psychology from the University of Glasgow’s Institute of Neuroscience and Psychology. My masters project investigated the effect of parental imprinting on partner preference for bisexual women with Lisa Debruine. Outside of work, I train with Norfork Roller Derby
